DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 : SEMIFINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; THEY ' RE IN CHARGE
DOC.TEXT: A Frenchman working his third_World Cup and a World Cup rookie from Colombia involved in a controversial call_in the previous round were picked Monday to referee the tournament ' s two semifinals . FIFA , soccer ' s governing body , chose Joel Quiniou for the game between Bulgaria and Italy in Giants Stadium and Jose Torres for the game between Sweden and Brazil at the Rose Bowl.Both semifinals are Wednesday . Torres was the referee in Sunday ' s 2-1 victory by Bulgaria over defending champion Germany and disallowed a goal by the Germans on a close offside call . With Germany leading , 1-0 , Andreas Moeller ' s shot hit the post in the 74th minute and Rudi Voeller put_in the rebound but was called offside . Two minutes later , Hristo Stoitchkov tied the game on a free_kick . Germany refused to criticize Torres or blame the loss on him .
